content:
Dear, Sirs, today we had this issue when try sending messages and messages not delivered.:

=WARNING REPORT==== 28-Jun-2021::20:41:59 ===
closing AMQP connection <0.643.0> (127.0.0.1:54978 -> 127.0.0.1:5672, vhost: '/', user: 'zulip'):
client unexpectedly closed TCP connection

Maybe someone has already faced a similar problem and has a solution?
Updating to the latest release did not affect the situation, as did reinstalling RabbitMQ.
Thank you.
This topic was moved here from #issues > AMQP, client unexpectedly closed TCP connection by Tim Abbott
